mapper.select: SELECT * FROM goodsinfofront WHERE front_belongs =#{belongs} AND front_area=#{area}
select MAX(front_belongs) frontBelongs,MAX(front_area) frontArea from goodsinfofront where front_belongs < 8 GROUP BY front_belongs ,front_area
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM goodsinfofront WHERE front_belongs = #{belongs} AND front_area =#{area}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO goodsinfofront ( id, front_area, front_belongs, front_name, front_img, front_sort, front_url, open_id ) SELECT f1.id, f1.area, f1.belongs, f1. NAME, f1.img, f1.sort, f1.url, f1.open_id FROM goodsinfo f1 WHERE belongs = #{belongs} AND area = #{area}

INSERT INTO goodsinfofront ( id, front_belongs, front_area, front_img, front_sort, front_status, front_title, front_url, front_bgcolor ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{belongs}, #{area}, #{img}, #{sort}, #{status}, #{title}, #{url}, #{bgColor} )
